name: BattleTanks [Online Multiplayer Capable]
description:
This game is a team vs. team tank battle playground. You can open a port and play with your friends over the internet!

Game modes: CTF, TDM, HOLD.

You can choose a LIGHT, MODERATE, or HEAVY chassis. Then, you can choose a LIGHT, MODERATE, or HEAVY cannon. However you cannot have a heavier cannon than chassis (No HEAVY cannon on LIGHT chassis). Each gun and chassis has different stats. The bodies can move slow with high health, or fast with low health. Some cannons have fast reload speeds and some are slow. Some do more damage or bounce more.

Very arcade like! Bullets bounce off walls.

This will probably not receive updates in the future unless I decide to work on it :/
